entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
